page.title: 13WESTFIELD
page.content: The farmer had fields of spring barley,winter barley, peas,wheat, courgettes,and sugar beet.Allthese fields were surrounded by trees 50 metres apart.It is a mixed soil farm. Near the farmhouse is a group of 264 pigeon holes.The farmer once bred pigeons for sport.Sheep are the only livestock.Sheep are the farmer's favourite animal of which he has 3,000.On the farm there are 850 acres of land.He has an reservoir 20 feet deep which holds 10,000,000 gallons of water.On the farm they have 8 helpers and they have a tractor each to use. There is one spare tractor and two spare combine harvesters.His helpers start work at 7.30am and finish at 4.30pm.In another barn there was a fan to keep the potatoes at the right tem- perature.
